title: Understanding photochemical degradation mechanisms in photoactive layer materials for organic solar cells
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,7426-7454
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00132J, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jianhua Han, Han Xu, Sri Harish Kumar Paleti, Anirudh Sharma, Derya Baran
This review provides a historic overview of the photodegradation mechanisms of photoactive materials in organic solar cells, shedding light on the role of photochemical photodegradation pathways to pave the way for stable organic photovoltaics.
